physical_appearance:This is an embroidered silk vestment. The fabric is embossed with repeated floral motifs. There is a panel along the front of the robe that features decorative grape and vine leaves in silver thread. Similar decorative designs are also featured on the sleeves. The collar is square-shaped.
subject_terms_1:floral (motifs) foliage (motifs) Roman Catholicism embroidery (visual works)

sgcool_label_text:Goan priest\u0027s Dalmatic or Tunicle - an outer garment that would be worn over a cassock as part of formal vestments. The cloth is embroidered with grapes and vine leaves
 in silver thread
